articles.title: What we know about the B1617 variant from India as COVID-19 sweeps South Asia - CNA
articles.description: NEW DELHI: India has recorded the world's sharpest spike in coronavirus infections this month, with political and financial capitals New Delhi and Mumbai running out of hospital beds, oxygen and medicines.

articles.title: Hang Seng Index erases losses as Xiaomi and Alibaba power market recovery - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Hong Kong stocks bucked losses in major Asia-Pacific markets gripped by inflation concerns. Xiaomi, Alibaba and Meituan helped the Hang Seng Index rebound from the biggest slide in seven weeks.
